Description.Text: Value Thomson Hotel is the latest and the largest of three Value Hotel chain and is strategically located near the junction of Balestier Road and Thomson Road. Easily accessible to the city center via city buses and the local MRT network, the 366 room Value Thomson Hotel stands 12-storey tall with each unit guaranteed to be spacious, comfortable and very affordable. Guests can expect all the basic amenities in their room and a little extras like bath essentials, complimentary bottled waters, and quality bedsheets and duvet to make each guest's stay more comfortable. Around the hotel there is an outdoor swimming pool that boasts amazing view of Balestier and Thomson area. There is also a workout room on the 7th floor for those who like to keep fit, and a 24-hour restaurant and cafe to serve guests with delicious food and snacks throughout the day. When it's time to leave, simply hop on a taxi and expect to get to the airport in half an hour.

Value Hotel Thomson is located just outside city centre. Local SBS public buses service number 21, 130, 131, 139, 145, 186. Experience ease of connectivity with quick access to Pan-Island Expressway (PIE) and Central Expressway (CTE) when you stay at Value Hotel Thomson. Public transport is readily available and easy to navigate in Singapore. Novena MRT station is 10 - 12 minutes walk away and there are many public buses at nearby bus-stops going to popular places in Singapore. Getting around our Island State is a breeze from Value Hotel Thomson - 30 minutes to Changi Airport, 15 minutes to the Central Business District and 10 minutes to the popular Orchard Road shopping belt.

Standard Twin - Standard Twin ( room with 2 single mattresses but without window)
